#
# Address/Size data for the various NAND flash sections.
# Section filename MUST match entries below.
#
sbl1        0x00000000 0x00180000
mibib       0x00180000 0x00100000
bootconfig  0x00280000 0x00080000
bootconfig1 0x00300000 0x00080000
tz          0x00380000 0x00380000
devcfg      0x00a80000 0x00080000
rpm         0x00b80000 0x00080000
ddr         0x00c80000 0x00080000
u-boot      0x00e00000 0x00180000
